input.sentences: my roommate prepared the food for our christmas party .
drinks were handed out all around .
would played a game of would you rather .

output.sentences: The roommates are busy in the kitchen preparing for the party.
Look at all of this amazing food.
The guests were handed drinks in red solo cups.
Other guests played games and enjoyed their drinks.
The guests enjoyed dancing the night away.
